aboutMeText1: I am a self-taught professional with solid skills in web and mobile development. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge to include backend development, exploring languages such as C# and Java.
aboutMeText2: My motivation in programming goes beyond simple skill enhancement; I constantly seek new challenges that allow me to grow professionally. Additionally, I am committed to improving my proficiency in English, recognizing its importance in the global technology landscape.
aboutMeText3: Regarding my soft skills, I highlight my leadership ability, friendly approach, and infectious enthusiasm. I am recognized for my creativity and ability to work collaboratively in a team setting. However, I consider my ability to learn quickly as my greatest strength, enabling me to assimilate new concepts and technologies with ease.
firedevResume1: I improved my front-end developer skills a lot, my programming logic, my communication and I learn new skills.
firedevResume2: I performed code refactor and faced challenges.
firedevResume3: The main tools I used was ReactJS, React Native, Typescript and NodeJS.
egsResume1: I develop mobile and web applications using ReactJS, React Native, Expo, TypeScript and Next.js.
egsResume2: The main things that I improved at EGS, no doubt, were making animations for mobile and improving application performance.
egsResume3: What I liked most to learn was making complex dashboard graphs both for mobile and web.
veryBadText: Very Bad: I don't know anything about.
veryGoodText: Very Good: I know everything about.
